display_long_description:
Inspired by BBC 6 Music Poet in Residence MURRAY LACHLAN YOUNG’s The Mystery of the Raddlesham Mumps and with visuals by MBD this darkly comic adventure is a quirky prequel to the story….. 

On the morning of the funeral of his parents, 7-year-old Crispin inherits his ancestral home, Raddlesham Mumps. He finds himself in the attic of a huge empty house with a collection of objects that begin to reveal a mysterious back story. The hidden story of the Mumps, starts here....

After completing the game we’d love to know what you thought! Contact us using the hashtag #RaddleshamMumps or handle @crispinclumps . Even better visit www.raddleshammumps.co.uk/feedback - where you can also find out about the book, the theatre show and the album!

The Mystery of the Raddlesham Mumps project has been made possible thanks to the support of Arts Council England, Research England, the EIRA project, Essex County Council and our generous crowdfunders.
